entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this morning. Rain along parts of the coast early this morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
